data.message: I was a Huge fan... you’re obviously talented AF.... but you just took a shit on people who loved you! You’ve got mad balls but you misused them & stirred the wrong pot! Not impressed & Disappointed! You forgot what “Recovery” is about & you just used your platform to divide the nation! Ego needs to be smacked! You know better...if you don’t...you’ll learn....

replies.message: Somebody grab Lori by the pussy her panties are in a bunch
tRump's unfit and will be impeached for his treason.
If you think he divided the nation and trump isn't then you haven't been paying attention.
MJ Perkins very grown up response MJ.... hopefully you find something in life you’re passionate about.
Jesse Ashe highly doubt it... but they’ll give all a good run to wait and see.

Kimberly Glomski I’ve been paying close attention & I feel very strong in where I stand behind the President! I know what needs to change in this world and I know he’s on it! He’s known for a long time!!!!
